lexUnit.name: gilded.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: covered in a thin layer of gold

sentence.text: The gilded frame with its antique curves no longer distracted the eye .
There was a clock on the mantelpiece and , above the clock , a small mirror in a gilded frame , darkened by soot .
The prints on the walls were dark and undistinguished , and the large , gilded mirror on the wall over the marble fireplace was speckled .
Placing a hand on her shoulder , he led her to an ornate , gilded mirror hanging above the carved stone fireplace .
In some ways , thought the rector , observing the cock on St Andrew 's spire gilded with the setting sun , one could have no better epitaph .
But everything is warm and gilded with the last glow of the sunset , through the room 's west-facing windows .
It is a fourteenth-century gilded copper work modelled on a design by Jacopino da Tradate .
The gilded cupola of the ceiling was supported by groups of caryatids and by trophies .
Often compared to a Chinese pagoda , it was decorated throughout with fantastic paintings and mottoes and included a finely decorated stateroom and a richly gilded bedroom .
She imagined a gilded barge with Jo√£o sitting in the stern .
A plumbers ' convention , Renwick noted from the outsize announcement propped on a gilded easel .
In the Roman Imperial period copper and bronze statues and silver and bronze jewellery were commonly gilded .
It consisted of wooden boards covered with leather , usually elaborately gilded .
The picture accomplished , the pages are restored to their normal position and the edge gilded .
Parts of the surface of the helmet were gilded , the boar , dragon heads , the nose and mouth of the face-mask , under surfaces of the eyebrows and the broad fluted strips flanking the crest .
` It had a gold collar round its neck , and the points of its antlers were gilded . "
It is richly gilded and splendidly adorned with plumes and silken ribbons .
I will never forget entering the brilliantly lit theatre , gilded and hung with great chandeliers , and seeing the women in ethereally lovely dresses .
